attributes.action: Stop animals being sold on Gumtree.
attributes.additional_details:
My newly rescued Airedale Terrier was advertised on the French equivalent of Gumtree, I have photo's of the add, along with photos from him being collected.  He was in an awful state, ungroomed & so hyper & stressed out.

I have also seen these adds on my Facebook groups.  I know my boy was in France.  But you see these adds on Gumtree, so many times.  I have seen folk post the original add, then another of the same dog being sold on for much more money!!!.
attributes.background:
Please stop animals being sold on Gumtree, it is an open door for folk that shouldn't own then.  I have come across instances, where the dogs have been sold on for a much higher price.  Also sadly with Dog fighting, whose to say they are not being used as bait dog's :(.  

Please put a stop to it.

rejection.details:
The decision about whether to sell pets or not is a matter for Gumtree, which is a private company.

You could try contacting Gumtree directly to ask them to change their policy.

Alternatively, you could start a petition asking Parliament to pass a law restricting the sale of animals on the internet.
